overview: Ole Olsen is Managing partner at Digital Collections GmbH. He studied business administration at the University of Hamburg. His first job at the publisher of the Hamburger Morgenpost newspaper gave him an insight into the craft of making newspapers. After completing his studies, he founded the consulting firm Beo Software and advised publishers on how to optimise editing systems. He founded Digital Collections in 1991 along with two other partners, where he has since remained managing partner.
